response.body:
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:madsrdf="http://www.loc.gov/mads/rdf/v1#" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:lcc="http://id.loc.gov/ontologies/lcc#" xmlns:bf="http://id.loc.gov/ontologies/bibframe/" xmlns:bflc="http://id.loc.gov/ontologies/bflc/" xmlns:ri="http://id.loc.gov/ontologies/RecordInfo#" xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" xmlns:pmo="http://performedmusicontology.org/ontology/" xmlns:lclocal="http://id.loc.gov/ontologies/lclocal/">
  <madsrdf:Topic rdf:about="http://id.loc.gov/authorities/subjects/sh87003768">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.loc.gov/mads/rdf/v1#Variant"/>
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.loc.gov/mads/rdf/v1#DeprecatedAuthority"/>
    <madsrdf:variantLabel xml:lang="en">Gaṇeśa (Hindu deity)</madsrdf:variantLabel>
    <madsrdf:elementList rdf:parseType="Collection">
      <madsrdf:TopicElement>
	<madsrdf:elementValue xml:lang="en">Gaṇeśa (Hindu deity)</madsrdf:elementValue>
      </madsrdf:TopicElement>
    </madsrdf:elementList>
    <madsrdf:deletionNote xml:lang="en">This authority record has been deleted because the subject heading is covered by an identical name heading (DLC)n 2017065815</madsrdf:deletionNote>
    <madsrdf:useInstead rdf:resource="http://id.loc.gov/authorities/names/n2017065815"/>
    <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="info:lc/authorities/sh87003768"/>
    <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="http://id.loc.gov/authorities/sh87003768#concept"/>
    <madsrdf:adminMetadata>
      <ri:RecordInfo>
	<ri:recordChangeDate rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">1987-06-12T00:00:00</ri:recordChangeDate>
	<ri:recordStatus rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">new</ri:recordStatus>
	<ri:recordContentSource rdf:resource="http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/organizations/dlc"/>
      </ri:RecordInfo>
    </madsrdf:adminMetadata>
    <madsrdf:adminMetadata>
      <ri:RecordInfo>
	<ri:recordChangeDate rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2018-01-05T13:54:56</ri:recordChangeDate>
	<ri:recordStatus rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">deprecated</ri:recordStatus>
	<ri:recordContentSource rdf:resource="http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/organizations/dlc"/>
      </ri:RecordInfo>
    </madsrdf:adminMetadata>
  </madsrdf:Topic>
</rdf:RDF>

headers.access-control-expose-headers: Content-Type, Cache-Control, X-URI, X-PrefLabel, X-PrefLabel-Escaped, X-PrefLabel-Encoded
